lines: 1. An ni mari, Ruoth,to niluongoa;Isenyisa herani;To adwaro inmond` ibed koda,Mond` ibed koda pile.
Bedi (mana) butapile pile, Ruoth,Ni mondo apar thoni;Bedi mana buta pile pile,Ruoth, Ni mond` adok nyathini.
2. Adwaro mondoati tichni, Ruoth;Adwaro mond` ikonya;Mondo aparindalo duto te,kik agomb mokome piny.
3. An amor pileka atiyoni,Ka chunya oheroi;Ka Alamo in,ka iwinjoa,Ka abedo nyathini.
4. Herani matutok anyal ng`eyo,Nyaka atundi kuno;Mor man e polookadho ng`eyo;Nyaka ayud kuwe kuomi.
